Module 5: Advanced Topics & Production Readiness

Module 5: Advanced Topics & Production Readiness

With the fundamentals of building a database-driven web API covered, this final module focuses on the essential skills required to build real-world, enterprise-grade applications. We will cover testing, security, containerization, and take a brief look at a modern alternative to Spring.

Lessons in this Module

  • Lesson 5.1: Testing - An introduction to unit and integration testing in the Java ecosystem with JUnit, Mockito, and Testcontainers.
  • Lesson 5.2: Security - Securing your API with Spring Security, including common patterns like JWT authentication.
  • Lesson 5.3: Containerization - Creating a Dockerfile for your Spring Boot application to prepare it for deployment.
  • Lesson 5.4: A Look at Micronaut - A brief introduction to Micronaut as a modern, compile-time alternative to Spring, highlighting its fast startup and low memory footprint.
